column4: hi im running the live cd... how do I check wich process is using port 80 ??
<10/13/05@20:56:13> [main]  error opening source socket! FATAL ERROR! Some other process is using this port!
<10/13/05@20:56:13> [main]  error opening source socket! FATAL ERROR! Some other process is using this port!
I would like to use port 80 instead of the default 8000
sorry im just going home from work now.  i do have a few shoutcast servers, and I know changing the port is a PITA
make sure shoutcast encoder and sc_serv are using different ports... like 81 and 80
Im sure if I change the portbase it will work
